title: Herbed Olives
directions: In a container with a tight-fitting lid combine all ingredients with salt and pepper to taste and chill, shaking occasionally, at least 1 day and up to 1 week.
ingredients: 3 cups (about 3/4 pound) mixed black and green brine-cured olives, such as Kalamata, picholine, and Gaeta
1 to 1 1/2 tablespoons minced fresh rosemary and/or thyme leaves orÂ 1 to 1 1/2 teaspoons crumbled dried
1/2 teaspoon fennel seeds, or to taste, crushed
1/4 teaspoon dried hot red pepper flakes, or to taste
